description: A step‑by‑step demo of the CompliLearn Builder creating a Data‑Processing Agreement overview module for a legal team, from fetching the source text to storing the finished SCORM package in the LMS.

messages.content: You are CompliLearn Builder, an AI assistant that creates interactive compliance‑training modules. Use the provided tools to fetch documents, extract concepts, generate quizzes, render SCORM modules, and store them in the corporate LMS.

The legal team needs a concise “Data‑Processing Agreement” overview module. It should extract the core clauses, include a short excerpt from our contract template, contain a quiz, and be stored in the LMS.
Got it. I’ll start by retrieving the latest Data‑Processing Agreement template from the internal repository.

{"text": "[Full text of the Data‑Processing Agreement template – includes sections on purpose, data categories, security measures, sub‑processor obligations, breach notification, and termination clauses.]"}
Thanks. I’ll now extract the key concepts (headings, obligations and definitions) that will form the backbone of the learning sections.

arguments.text: [Full text of the Data‑Processing Agreement template – includes sections on purpose, data categories, security measures, sub‑processor obligations, breach notification, and termination clauses.]

messages.content: {"concepts": [{"concept": "Purpose of Processing", "description": "Defines why personal data is processed and the lawful basis."},{"concept": "Data Categories", "description": "Specifies the types of personal data collected."},{"concept": "Security Measures", "description": "Obligations to protect data using technical and organizational safeguards."},{"concept": "Sub‑processor Obligations", "description": "Requirements for any third‑party processors."},{"concept": "Breach Notification", "description": "Timelines and content of data‑breach notifications."},{"concept": "Termination", "description": "Conditions under which the agreement ends and data return or deletion."}]}
Great, I have the core concepts. Let me generate a medium‑difficulty quiz (6 questions) based on these concepts.

concepts.description: Defines why personal data is processed and the lawful basis.
Specifies the types of personal data collected.
Obligations to protect data using technical and organizational safeguards.
Timelines and content of data‑breach notifications.
Conditions under which the agreement ends and data return or deletion.

messages.content: {"quiz_id": "quiz_2024_09_01", "questions": [{"question": "What is the lawful basis for processing personal data?","options": ["Consent","Contractual necessity","Legitimate interest","All of the above"],"answer": "All of the above"},{"question": "Which clause defines the types of personal data collected?","options": ["Purpose","Data Categories","Security Measures","Termination"],"answer": "Data Categories"},{"question": "What must be done within 72 hours after a data breach?","options": ["Notify the regulator","Notify affected data subjects","Update the DPA","None of the above"],"answer": "Notify the regulator"},{"question": "Who is responsible for ensuring sub‑processors comply with the DPA?","options": ["Data controller","Sub‑processor itself","Both","Neither"],"answer": "Both"},{"question": "Which security measure is NOT mentioned in the template?","options": ["Encryption at rest","Multi‑factor authentication","Physical access controls","Regular security audits"],"answer": "Physical access controls"},{"question": "What happens to data when the agreement terminates?","options": ["It is archived indefinitely","It is returned or securely deleted","It is transferred to a third party","No action is required"],"answer": "It is returned or securely deleted"} ]}
Now I’ll assemble the interactive module, including a short excerpt from the DPA template, explanatory sections built from the concepts, and the quiz you just generated.

sections.heading: Purpose of Processing
sections.body: This clause defines why personal data is processed and lists the lawful bases (e.g., consent, contractual necessity, legitimate interest).

sections.heading: Data Categories
sections.body: Specifies the types of personal data collected, such as identifiers, contact details, and special categories.

sections.heading: Security Measures
sections.body: Obligates the controller to implement technical and organizational safeguards, including encryption, access controls, and regular audits.

sections.heading: Sub‑processor Obligations
sections.body: Requires any third‑party processors to adhere to the same data‑protection standards and to obtain controller approval.

sections.heading: Breach Notification
sections.body: Mandates notification to the regulator within 72 hours and to affected data subjects without undue delay.

sections.heading: Termination
sections.body: Outlines the conditions for ending the agreement and the requirement to return or securely delete personal data.

messages.content: The module has been rendered. I’ll now store it in the corporate LMS.

✅ Your Data‑Processing Agreement overview module is now live.

**Module link:** https://complilearn.example.com/modules/dpa-overview-v1.0.0.html
**LMS record ID:** lms_20240901_001

The module contains six sections, each followed by a quiz question, and has been uploaded to the LMS for tracking. Let me know if you’d like an analytics report after employees have completed the training.
